verses.text: \w Then|strong="G1899"\w* \w fourteen|strong="G1180"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* \w after|strong="G1223"\w* I went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w*, and \w took|strong="G4838"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w* \w with|strong="G4838"\w* \add me\add* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* I went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w communicated|strong="G0394"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* that \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w privately|strong="G2398"\w* to them \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were of \w reputation|strong="G1380"\w*, lest by any \w means|strong="G3381"\w* I should \w run|strong="G5143"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* had \w run|strong="G5143"\w*, \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w*, who \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* a \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w*, was \w compelled|strong="G0315"\w* to be \w circumcised|strong="G4059"\w*:

And \w that|strong="G1161"\w* because \w of|strong="G1223"\w* false \w brethren|strong="G5569"\w* unawares brought \w in|strong="G3920"\w*, \w who|strong="G3748"\w* came in \w privily|strong="G3922"\w* to spy \w out|strong="G2684"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might \w bring|strong="G2615"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* into \w bondage|strong="G2615"\w*:

To \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we gave \w place|strong="G1502"\w* by \w subjection|strong="G5292"\w*, no, \w not|strong="G3761"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* an \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* might \w continue|strong="G1265"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* these \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w seemed|strong="G1380"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w somewhat|strong="G5100"\w*, (\w whatsoever|strong="G3697"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w*, it \w maketh|strong="G1308"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w matter|strong="G1308"\w* to \w me|strong="G3427"\w*: \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w accepteth|strong="G2983"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w manâ€™s|strong="G0444"\w* \w person|strong="G4383"\w*:) \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w seemed|strong="G1380"\w* \add to be somewhat\add* in conference \w added|strong="G4323"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* to \w me|strong="G1698"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w contrariwise|strong="G5121"\w*, when they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of the \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* was committed unto \w me|strong="G4100"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \add the gospel\add* of the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \add was\add* unto \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*;

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* wrought \w effectually|strong="G1754"\w* in \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w apostleship|strong="G0651"\w* of the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, the same was \w mighty|strong="G1754"\w* in \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*:)

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w Cephas|strong="G2786"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w seemed|strong="G1380"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w pillars|strong="G4769"\w*, \w perceived|strong="G1097"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, they \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* to \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* the right \w hands|strong="G1188"\w* of \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \add should go\add* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w heathen|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*.

\w Only|strong="G3440"\w* \add they would\add* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we should \w remember|strong="G3421"\w* the \w poor|strong="G4434"\w*; the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G4704"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* was \w forward|strong="G4704"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* was \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*, I \w withstood|strong="G0436"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w face|strong="G4383"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* to be \w blamed|strong="G2607"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, he did \w eat|strong="G4906"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* they were \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, he \w withdrew|strong="G5288"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w separated|strong="G0873"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w fearing|strong="G5399"\w* them \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w other|strong="G3062"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w dissembled|strong="G4942"\w* \w likewise|strong="G2532"\w* with \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; insomuch \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w Barnabas|strong="G0921"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* was carried away \w with|strong="G4879"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w dissimulation|strong="G5272"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w walked|strong="G3716"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w uprightly|strong="G3716"\w* according \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, I \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \add them\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w*, \w being|strong="G5225"\w* a \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w livest|strong="G2198"\w* after the manner of \w Gentiles|strong="G1483"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* as do the \w Jews|strong="G2452"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* compellest \w thou|strong="G0315"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* to live as do the \w Jews|strong="G2450"\w*?

\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \add who are\add* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* by \w nature|strong="G5449"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*,

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G1344"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G1437"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* have \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we might be \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*: for \w by|strong="G1360"\w* the \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w shall|strong="G1344"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* be \w justified|strong="G1344"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w*, while we \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* to be \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, we \w ourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* are \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*, \add is\add* \w therefore|strong="G0687"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* the \w minister|strong="G1249"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*? God \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* I \w build|strong="G3618"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* the \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w destroyed|strong="G2647"\w*, I \w make|strong="G4921"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w* a \w transgressor|strong="G3848"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* am \w dead|strong="G0599"\w* to the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I might \w live|strong="G2198"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

I am crucified \w with|strong="G4957"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: \w nevertheless|strong="G1161"\w* I \w live|strong="G2198"\w*; yet \w not|strong="G3765"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* the life \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G2198"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* I \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G3860"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*.

I \w do|strong="G0114"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w frustrate|strong="G0114"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \add come\add* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w then|strong="G0686"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* is \w dead|strong="G0599"\w* in \w vain|strong="G1432"\w*.
